title: Cottontail Kog'Maw
body: I love the cottontail skins. Just the idea of taking a cute champion and making them even cuter by putting them in a bunny suit is perfect. But I feel like there are some cute champions that are left out, namely the cutest champion of all, the cuddly little void puppy: Kog'Maw!

replies.body: Cute. I adore the four ears.
Oh wow a rioter replied! This means it's like guaranteed to be in the game now right?
This definitely seems like it would be a great follow up to that one Fizz skin
